storyInfo: Nian and Dusk are uneasy about their brother's return to Dahuang. He Sheng and Grain Buds encounter a merchant who claims to have come home for the first time in years, and offers to sell them a 'wish'.

attributes.content: My dear sister.
Traveling with the gentleman has taught me that the lands beyond are very different from Dahuang. Humans have invented many new things in just a few decades.
There are all kinds of cities in Yan, more than just fields as far as the eye can see. There are glamorous palaces and busy markets, and so many more fascinating things.
I'm just coming back for a little break. Then I'll go out on a long journey again. I don't know how many years it will be.
Dahuang isn't the backwater hovel it once was. There are many people who can take care of these fields for you. Are you sure you don't want to go and see with me?
I realized that the world outside isn't so different from Dahuang after all.
How long has it been? Decades? Centuries? Perspectives change.
The more you see, the more you realize that people are the same everywhere. Devious, but predictable.
Yes. Now I fully understand what the gentleman said before he died.
Just how long do you plan to stay here, my dear sister?
Weiâ€”
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Why do you still shut your self away like this? It took us so much effort to get you out of that hill. Shu's not here. Wanna go for a walk with me?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: There's nothing new here, but the produce is on another level compared the agricultural plates in the other cities. Say, have you seen how they make booze out of grain yet?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Ugh.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Did the Tianshi Bureaus come looking for trouble?
attributes.name: Nian
Dusk
attributes.content: I'm not afraid of the Tianshi Bureaus!

attributes.name: Dusk
attributes.content: I'm just... I...
With skills like that, you should be dealing with that big guy outside who refuses to move.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: All the Tianshis are out there for the relief effort. What can I do on my own? It's not like I could do it with my own two hands...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'm so bored! C'mon, lemme see what you're drawing...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Oh, don't be like that. I could give you ideas, if you've got art block or whatever.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Get, outâ€”
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Why so nervous? Looks like you're hiding something.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: No I'm not. Something's just bothering me.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: The folks at the Tianshi Bureaus might be annoying, but they can't actually do anything about you. The imperial court has already given us a guarantee. The worst they could do is complain.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: So you're bothered about... him.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I can feel his presence. He never hides. Are you sure you don't want to go and see him? We're family, after all.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Wow, you really are cold... I heard how he always brought you the best paintings of the era whenever he passed by your hill. Don't pretend you didn't like them.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Things are different now.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: When was the last time you saw him?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I can't say I remember.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: His business got so big that he started getting warnings from the Sui Regulator. He pulled things back a little afterwards. He's been enjoying himself the last few years, sightseeing all over Yan.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But the Sui Regulator keeps a much tighter eye on him than it does us.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: How do you know all that?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I had a peek in the Regulator's notebooks in the course of my dealings with them. The parts that weren't super-double classified, anyway.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: 'His business became so big'? I always remember him as that simple-minded boy following Shu around, with no eye for anything other than silkworms and mulberry.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: The last time I saw him was when he 'passed by', and I caught a glimpse through the painting.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: His eyes were clouded, repulsive, likeâ€”
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: â€”like the stinky weiqi failure, I know.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: He was in Baizao the year our weiqi failure broke out. Who do you think Yan had its eyes on for the past few years while ignoring you and I?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You think they're in cahoots?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: No idea. I thought Ling and Dage were the only ones he got along with.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But he wouldn't have been able to call on people like he does now if the Sui Regulator made a decision like that, would he?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You know how comfortable he is in human skin. Every transaction in the books he submits every year to the Sui Regulator is perfectly above board. You couldn't find a flaw if you put them under a microscope.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: He's always the first to donate whenever a city is hit by Catastrophe. The Sui Regulator has to give him some respect on that point alone.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: You really think he did it out of the kindness of his heart?
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: He's our brother. I won't badmouth him behind his back.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Yeah, riiiight.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Anyway, relationships like ours don't exist amongst humans. Brothers? Sisters? I...
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: You what?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Get out of here. Now, and no peeking!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Fine, fine. No need to get all violent and excitable.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Sibling ties in the worldly sense mean nothing to us, after all...
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Maybe Yanese historians will invent a word to describe our relationship in a few hundred years or so... maybe.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: But we would've thrown a few more family reunions if you could change that stubborn streak of yours.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: I'm not stubborn.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: So, when are you going to show me the twelve scrolls in your study?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Go away!
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: Yes, I know it's twelve. You kept the one for Sanjie, our third sister, even after she disappeared.
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: â€”Have you figured out who the people depicted in the scrolls are? Or did you give up on that?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Unless... you haven't even started on your self-portrait?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: Why are you so stubborn?
attributes.name: Nian

attributes.content: A rainstorm.
The dark clouds have dispersed, but the moisture in the air remains palpable.
Zuo Le watches He Sheng clench his teeth and press the switch on his apparatus.
A large vehicle, the likes of which he has never seen, rolls over the fields, trampling row after row of crops underneath.
Wind blows past dead, yellow leaves, making a sound like scornful laughter.
Disaster comes and goes as it pleases.
What can mortal men do before the will of Heaven?
All these crops have to be destroyed?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It was my first ever test field. Maize. All soaked in Originium-polluted water. No other choice.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Restoring Originium-polluted soil is extremely difficult. The land is vast, but precious little of it is fit for farming.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Even the cob of the corn was sweet. I tried it when I first came to Dahuang. It was the best thing ever.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I wanted to grow it in the earth, so that everyone could taste the sweetness, feel the joy that I did when I tried it for the first time.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Only the bare earth is left once the engine rumbling passes.
Found you, Xiaohe!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: The farmers are arguing with the Tianshis after the engineers bulldozed a field. You need to come! Hurry!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Folks, the disaster has left us with little supplies and even less time. We can't afford any delays.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: The decision has already been made to abandon these farms. Please, let us pass through with our tools.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Abandon? You liar! The Tianshis who planted here told me two days ago that the crop research was at a crossroads.
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: Who gave you the authority to trample our fields with your trucks?
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: 'Originium particle concentration in Plate D-4 soil samples exceed acceptable limits.' That means this field is polluted and no longer usableâ€”
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: We've dealt with stuff like this every year! Who do you think you are, an outsider deciding that this field should be abandoned?
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: These fields can't be moved. It's been polluted by natural disaster, and the higher-ups have made the decision to not save it...
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: This is already a bad year for the harvest! There's going to be a famine if we don't save the fields!
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: You've never seen thousands die of starvation, have you? All you people care about is your construction projects! You're not helping to save the fields, you're trampling them!
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: Dahuang belongs to us!
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: You speak without wisdom.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: No wisdom, huh?
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: I'll show you wisdom!
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: You dare strike me?
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Screw you, son of a...
attributes.name: Angry Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: I'll show you a son of a...
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: Hey, everybody, calm down!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Uncle Wang!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: These fields...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Just look! It's bad enough that the fields were ruined by Originium, now these people are running over it with their trucks!
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: All they talk about is ministers and reports. Minister who? We've never seen them!
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: We've not received any notice of these fields being abandoned.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I thought the decision had been made to prioritize saving the soil...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: You didn't hear? The construction supplies have arrived. The rebuilding of Dahuang resumed last night.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: The cost of soil repairs has been re-assessed based on the latest damage reports.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: The decision was made to prioritize construction on the core and abandon the outer agricultural plates... and make preparations to move the core city.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Has research on the source of the pollutant been completed? Why the hasty decision?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This comes from Tianshi Bureaus... way up. You can ask up the chain yourself, if you don't believe it.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: He Sheng turns around. The farmers stare blankly at the tread marks left on the fields.
If the Tianshi Bureaus' instructions are to abandon the fields, we will comply.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: But these fields aren't just places of work; they're people's homes as well.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: If there hasn't been a formal notice of evacuation, please, move this equipment elsewhere, at least for now.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Fine. But it'll happen in the next few days.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: Duoxie.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I understand the hard work you folks put into farming this land, but things have changed.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: People were stuck to the earth before the nomadic cities. Today, though, most agriculture takes place in hydroponic facilities on mobile plates.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: To be frank, there's nothing special about this land.
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: You said you're studying Originium-resistant crops, but nothing's come of the research after all these years, has it?
attributes.name: Tumu Tianshi

attributes.content: I'm just not sure... if this is the only result, then there is no way to expand the application of the Wanqing 'the Ten Thousand Qing of Fertile Fields' project.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: All these years, and nothing to show for it... not even a bud of hope.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: They're gone. What did you say to them, Xiaohe?
attributes.name: Angry Farmer

attributes.content: Nothing special...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: ...I think we should get to cleaning up, Uncle Wang.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Big Buffalo? Big Buffalo! What are you doing, just standing there?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: What are we gonna do? Listen to the Tianshis and move Dahuang away? Leave all these fields behind?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: We should go ask the Xiangzhang.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: ...Say something!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: She would be the first to know if anything was happening to Dahuang. If she isn't saying anything, that means it's out of her hands...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: And mine...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Why are you holding your head like that?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Maybe Shennong really was a celestial Xian...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Otherwise, how could she have carved out farmland in an environment like this?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Sure, Shennong was amazing, but it's amazing how people have taken care of the land.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Shennong would be so mad if you give up this easily!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Whoa!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Grain Buds steps on something and hastily pulls her leg back. A figure rises from the swaying rice.
Aww, that was a good dream...
attributes.name: Napping Man

attributes.content: I dreamed of a bumper harvest, before a Catastrophe woke me up.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: Why are you sleeping in the fields? Someone might step on you.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: You already stepped on me.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: That's because you're sleeping in the fields!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Apologies, sir. Are you okay?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I'm not injured, but I've got a big muddy footprint on this fine fabric...
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: It's your fault for not watching where you're sleeping!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: You should watch where you're walking.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: Grain Buds...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Well, what do you want me to do? Wash it for you? Buy a new set?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Ach, forget it. All my clothes are made of the finest stuff from all over the land. You wouldn't know how to wash it.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: Are you the one who delivered the relief supplies?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Hey, you're awfully clever.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: I'm a trader who managed to make a few coins. I came back when I heard about the disaster that hit Dahuang. Got to do my part for my homeland, after all.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: You're from Dahuang? Why were you sleeping in the fields, then? Don't you have a home here?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: It's been so long that I could hardly recognize the place. Lost my way... say, do you know where the shadow play theater is?
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: Shadow play? What's that?
attributes.name: Grain Buds
Well-Dressed Man
attributes.content: A kind of play that uses shadows cast by cloth-shrouded lamps and straw figures.

attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man
attributes.content: Do you not watch shadow plays here any more?
I've never seen it...
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Hm... where do you celebrate the harvest now?
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: The great stage?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Just follow this path and turn left at the third tree. It's behind the Shennong Shrine.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Oh, the Shennong Shrine is still here. That's good to hear.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: Thanks. You're the first one to point the way for me. Well, fate has determined that we would meet. Here, I have a wish for sale. Anything you like.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: The man opens his hand to reveal a round stone that gives off a serene glow.
What's this?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: A wish. For anything you desire.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: A wish?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I don't believe you. You're a trader, not some Xian. How could you make my wish come true?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: I may be a humble trader, but I'm a big enough deal that I buy and sell anything.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: But the opportunity to trade with me doesn't come to everyone.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: ...For real?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Grain Buds looks back at He Sheng behind her, thinks about it, and turns back to the man.
(Hushed) I wish...
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: (Hushed) I wish Dahuang could always be safe and peaceful, and the harvests always good.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Sure, I can sell you that wish. What will you pay me for it?
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: Grain Buds... this guy is kinda weird. We should go.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: There's no use trying to scam me. I don't have any valuables.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: It doesn't have to be valuable in terms of monetary value. I accept anything that you value and treasure.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: Xiaohe! Can I play that song?
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Song? What song?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Grain Buds pouts.
You stupid buffalo!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Far away, a few fowlbeasts perch atop a stockbeast, picking bugs off its hide with their long beaks.
The stockbeast quietly munches on grass, while the fowlbeasts frolic atop, occasionally stretching their necks and chirping happily.
Grain Buds puts her flute to her lips.
The wind provides a gentle accompaniment.
Green hills, flowing water, moonlight on the riverâ™ª
Sway, sway, little boat, let the flowers bloomâ™ª
Silent are the stars on high, the wandering seeds sproutâ™ª
Far on a boat you go, rice flowers in the windâ™ª
Sway, sway, far away you goâ™ª
A fine payment.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: The stone is yours. Your wish will come true.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: ...Hmph.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Grain Buds puts down the flute, glares at He Sheng, and runs away fuming.
She looked angry. Why?
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: She arranged it for me when I took my entrance exam three years ago.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I remembered. She just put me on the spot...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Ah. Such precious sentiment.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: What about you? Is there anything you would like to buy from me?
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: Thank you, but there's nothing I want in particular right now.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Or should I say, what I want can't be bought. I have to earn it on my own.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I could hear you out, if you'd like. There isn't much I can brag about, but I've been to more places than most, and so I sell more things than most.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: You said you sell anything. Do you sell a future where nobody will starve?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: Wh-What?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The more valuable the good, the higher the price. What price will you pay for your tremendous dream?
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I've cleaned up the polluted crops, He Sheng. Anything else you need me toâ€”
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Youâ€”
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'm not sure why you're staring at me, young man. Have we met before?
attributes.name: Well-Dressed Man

attributes.content: Excuse me, sir, we need to talk.
attributes.name: Zuo Le
